title: Three NYC Corrections Officers Accused of Faking Sick Leave
description: As New York City’s jails faced a staffing crisis, federal prosecutors said the officers used falsified sick notes and lied about trips to the doctor to avoid going to work.
dc:creator: Rebecca Davis O’Brien
media:credit: Uli Seit for The New York Times
media:description: A wave of staff absenteeism at the Rikers Island jail complex has allowed violence to run unchecked.
